metadata.title: Bless You & 17 Other Great Hits
description: 17 songs from before Tony Orlando tied one on (a yellow ribbon, that is)! Includes all of his teen idol, pre-Dawn hits: Bless You; Halfway to Paradise; Happy Times (Are Here to Stay); Some Kind of Wonderful; Am I the Guy; the Livin'' Touch, and more, all early-'60s Epic material.
